feed.title: Google Cloud: Text-to-Speech
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Text-to-Speech

entry.content: Chirp 3: HD voices now support speech synthesis in Preview for the Punjabi (pa-IN) language. For more information, see Chirp 3: Language Availability.
entry.summary: Punjabi language (`pa-IN`) now supports HD voice speech synthesis in Preview. This feature enhances the naturalness and quality of synthesized speech for Punjabi content. Explore the updated language availability for more details.
entry.title: Feature: Punjabi HD Voices in Preview

entry.content:
The latest Gemini-2.5 TTS Flash (gemini-2.5-flash-tts) and Pro (gemini-2.5-pro-tts) are now available in global, us, eu, and northamerica-northeast1 regions.

For more information on how to take advantage of the extended regional availability, see the Gemini TTS documentation page.
entry.summary: The Gemini-2.5 TTS Flash and Pro models are now available in global, us, eu, and northamerica-northeast1 regions. This expansion provides greater flexibility and accessibility for your text-to-speech needs. Refer to the Gemini TTS documentation for details on utilizing this expanded availability.
entry.title: Feature: Gemini TTS now in more regions

entry.content: Chirp 3: HD voices now support speech synthesis in the following languages: bg-BG, cs-CZ, et-EE, el-GR, he-IL, hr-HR, hu-HU, lt-LT, lv-LV, ro-RO, sk-SK, sl-SI, and sr-RS. For more information, see Chirp 3: Language Availability.
entry.summary: Chirp 3 now supports speech synthesis in 13 new languages: Bulgarian, Czech, Estonian, Greek, Hebrew, Croatian, Hungarian, Lithuanian, Latvian, Romanian, Slovak, Slovenian, and Serbian. This expansion enhances the capabilities of our speech synthesis technology, offering more options for developers and users worldwide.
entry.title: Feature: HD voices support for new languages

entry.content: Gemini TTS now supports synthesis for streaming requests. For more information, see the Gemini TTS page.
entry.summary: Gemini TTS now supports streaming requests.
entry.title: Feature: Gemini TTS Streaming Support

entry.content: Gemini TTS now supports relaxing safety filters for accounts with monthly invoiced billing. For more information, see the Gemini TTS page.
entry.summary: Gemini TTS now supports relaxing safety filters for accounts with monthly invoiced billing.
entry.title: Changed: Gemini TTS Update

entry.content: Chirp 3: instant custom voice now supports voice cloning key generation in the eu and us regions. For more information, see the Chirp 3: instant custom voice page.
entry.summary: The Chirp 3: instant custom voice feature now supports voice cloning key generation in the `eu` and `us` regions.
entry.title: Changed: Chirp 3 now supports voice cloning key generation

entry.content:
Gemini-TTS is generally available (GA) and provides support for 30 voices and over 70 locales. You can synthesize single or multi-speaker speech from short snippets to long-form narratives. You can precisely dictate style, accent, pace, tone, and even emotional expression using natural-language prompts.

For more information, see Gemini TTS. Give it a try in Media Studio.
entry.summary: Gemini-TTS has reached general availability, offering a wide range of voices and locale support. This advanced text-to-speech model allows for detailed control over speech synthesis, enabling users to generate single or multi-speaker audio with precise style, accent, pace, tone, and emotional expression using natural-language prompts.
entry.title: Announcement: Gemini-TTS Now Generally Available

entry.content: Chirp 3: HD voices is available on the asia-northeast1 endpoint. For more information, see Chirp 3: HD voices.
entry.summary: Chirp 3 HD voices are now accessible on the asia-northeast1 endpoint. This update enhances voice quality for users in this region. Further details can be found in the Chirp 3 documentation.
entry.title: Changed: HD voices now available in asia-northeast1

entry.content: Chirp 3: HD voices is available on the europe-west2 endpoint. For more information, see Chirp 3: HD voices.
entry.summary: HD voices are now accessible via the `europe-west2` endpoint. Learn more about this update at https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/chirp3-hd.
entry.title: Changed: HD voices now on europe-west2

entry.content: Chirp 3: instant custom voice supports the Chirp 3: HD voice controls for pace control, pause control, and custom pronunciations. For more information, see the Chirp 3: instant custom voice page.
entry.summary: Chirp 3 now offers instant custom voice with advanced controls for pace, pause, and pronunciation.
entry.title: Changed: Chirp 3: instant custom voice

entry.content: Chirp 3: Instant custom voice supports new input audio encodings PCM, MP3, and M4A, with any sample rate. For more information, see the Chirp 3: Instant custom voice page.
entry.summary: Chirp 3 now supports PCM, MP3, and M4A audio encodings for instant custom voice.
entry.title: Changed: Chirp 3 instant custom voice
